title: not in game bug
body:
so i was going to play a custom game, i was in the champion select and my friend wanted to play a normal game with me so i quit the champ select and tried to start a game but apperanty i was assigned to a existing game so i looked my name up in quickfind and it said i was playing the game i (tried) to quit in champ select

anyway it didnt really matter just posting this to see if anyone else has had this happen to them

replies.body: Ghost games are happening more frequently it seems.
